entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -36.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -40.8°C
Wind: WSW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 48 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 58 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
